verses.kjv: And I saw another sign in heaven, great and marvellous, seven angels having the seven last plagues; for in them is filled up the wrath of God.
verses.ct: Then I saw another sign in heaven, spectacular and awe-inspiring: 7 angels carrying the 7 final plagues, which would bring God's wrath to completion.

verses.kjv: And I saw as it were a sea of glass mingled with fire: and them that had gotten the victory over the beast, and over his image, and over his mark, and over the number of his name, stand on the sea of glass, having the harps of God.
verses.ct: I also saw what looked like a sea of glass mixed with fire. Standing on that glass sea were those who had triumphed over the beast, over its image, over its mark, and over the number of its name. They were holding harps from God.

verses.kjv: And they sing the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, Great and marvellous are thy works, Lord God Almighty; just and true are thy ways, thou King of saints.
verses.ct: They sang the song of Moses, the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb: 'Your deeds are spectacular and awe-inspiring, Lord God Almighty! Your paths are right and trustworthy, King of the nations!

verses.kjv: Who shall not fear thee, O Lord, and glorify thy name? for thou only art holy: for all nations shall come and worship before thee; for thy judgments are made manifest.
verses.ct: Who would not deeply revere you, Lord, and bring honor to your name? You alone are holy. Every nation will come and worship in your presence, because your righteous judgments have been revealed.'

verses.kjv: And after that I looked, and, behold, the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened:
verses.ct: After this I looked, and the temple — the sanctuary of the covenant — in heaven was opened.

verses.kjv: And the seven angels came out of the temple, having the seven plagues, clothed in pure and white linen, and having their breasts girded with golden girdles.
verses.ct: Out of the temple came the 7 angels carrying the 7 plagues. They were dressed in clean, bright linen, with golden sashes wrapped across their chests.

verses.kjv: And one of the four beasts gave unto the seven angels seven golden vials full of the wrath of God, who liveth for ever and ever.
verses.ct: Then one of the 4 living creatures handed the 7 angels 7 golden bowls filled with the wrath of God, who lives forever and ever.

verses.kjv: And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power; and no man was able to enter into the temple, till the seven plagues of the seven angels were fulfilled.
verses.ct: The temple was filled with smoke from the glory and power of God, and no one could enter the temple until the 7 plagues carried by the 7 angels had run their full course.
